title: Twelve considerable serious cautions, very necessary to be observed, in, and about a reformation according to the Word of God. Wherein diverse particular inconsistences with the word of God, very incident to reformations (so called) are briefly insisted upon, and argued from the Word of God. / By John Goodvvin, an unworthy servant of God in the Gospel of his deare son.
author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.
publisher: Printed by M.S. for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Alley.,
notes: Verso of first leaf contains apology and permission to print signed: John Bachiler.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 17 1645"; second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
